update_password_subtitle: Choose a password different from the older one.
update_password_length: Password must be at least 6 characters
update_password_complexity: Password must contain at least one letter and one number
update_password_success_msg: Your password has been successfully updated. You can now log in with your new password. If you need further assistance, feel free to reach out!
quit_game: Are you sure you want to quit the game?
quit_room: Are you sure you want to quit the wait room?
buy_avatar_subtitle: Choose from a variety of unique avatars to stand out in the game.
buy_more_players_subtitle: Unlock additional players to expand your team and enjoy bigger challenges!
profile_settings_success_msg: Your profile has been updated successfully. All changes have been saved. Thank you for keeping your information up to date!
otp_sent: We have sent an OTP to your email. Please enter it below to verify your account.
forgot_password_message: Don’t worry. We’ve got you covered. Enter your email address and we’ll send you an OTP code to reset your password.
dashboard_message: Hit the button below to set up your room, invite your friends, and get ready for an epic round of wordplay and surprises!
title1: The Ultimate In-Person Word Assassination Game
title2: Create or Join a Room to Get Started
desc1: We bring friends together in a fun, face-to-face challenge where words are your weapons. Gather 2–6 players, launch the app, and let the deception begin. Talk smart, play smarter!
desc2: Explore helpful videos and insightful PDFs, carefully designed to support your well-being, strengthen your mindset, and guide you through each day with calm and confidence.
desc3: Planning a party or game night? Upgrade your app to unlock support for up to 12 players in a single game. Perfect for big gatherings and even more chaotic fun!
